div.ab:
الــسّلام و
واللّه اللّه يأخي إن قدرت
تشتري لي عشرين قلم
بسرعة
وتشتري
من كل بد اللّه بسم اللّه
عليك ورحمة أمتعني اللّه بك
قد كنت وضعت
عليك

ăs salām *** wa *******
** wa ăl lāhu ăl lāhu yā ʾaḫ ī ʾin qadarta
taštarī l ī ʿišrīna qalam
bi surʿaẗ:in
*** wa taštarī ***
min kulli budd:ini ăl lāhu lā yuʿdim nī faṭla ka wa ăs salāmu
ʿalay ka wa raḥmaẗu ăl lāhi wa barakātu hu wa ăl ḥamdu li l lāhi waḥda hu
*** ăl ʾaḫ waḥda hu min kulli budd:in
wa ăs salāmu ʿalay ka

Greetings to ......
By God, by God, O my brother! If you can,
please buy me twenty pens
quickly.
[........] please buy [........].
by all means. I pray that God will not deprive me from your kindness. Peace
be upon you. God's mercy and blessings be upon you. Praise be to God alone.
[........... my] brother alone by all means.
Peace be upon you.
